long_description: An elite performance top with a pro-level fit, the women's Sugoi RSR T-Shirt uses innovative technology to help you keep your cool during high-octane workouts. Textured, technical knit breathes, wicks and dries fast; offers comfortable stretch for friction-free running. Mesh panels in heat zones enhance airflow. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability. Rear pocket; bonded hem for a performance aesthetic. Reflective highlights on the women's Sugoi RSR T-Shirt increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: An elite performance top with a pro-level fit, the women's Sugoi RSR T-Shirt uses innovative technology to help you keep your cool during high-octane workouts.
